Package handler

Class WeatherHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • handler.Handler
      • handler.WeatherHandler
  • public class WeatherHandler
extends Handler
    This handler can collect weather information if weatherInfo was set.

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> producePerspectiveWeather​(org.json.JSONObject json)
                                                                                 throws org.json.JSONException
        Produce data from given JSONObject.

        搜集並整理「最近」天氣資料.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Map<String, String> contain many weather element.

      • weatherInit

        public void weatherInit()
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Build data.

        build predict_weather, current_weather and immediate_weather
        Use class weatherAPI get each url.
        Catch nessesary data form url.

        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If any exception occurs.
